title: Why lose LP when exit out of champ select ?
body:
Isn't it pretty dumb that people lose LP and gets to wait 5-30 minute before queuing up again ? I think that you shouldn't lose anything because it's just champ select and not in-game. Sometime people are exiting out because their friend just log on or you have to go somewhere and that isn't fair cause you are deciding to leave champ select which doesn't affect anyone. I mean there can still be consequences of leaving champ select but i don't think you should lose LP in rank champ select.

If you agree thumbs up so riot can see thanks!
